backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high‑level descriptions of all frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style layers defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for books, topics, questions, and saved questions.
frontend/src/components.json: Shadcn UI config defining paths, Tailwind settings, and component aliases.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with back navigation, title, and saved‑questions button with counter.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout wrapping pages with header, footer, and toast provider.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Clickable styled card displaying book metadata and navigation affordances.
frontend/src/components/HintsPanel.tsx: Expandable hint viewer supporting incremental reveal, show-all, and hide-all controls.
frontend/src/components/ProseContent.tsx: Component rendering HTML content with styled prose formatting.
Buttons for marking a question complete or saved with tooltips and state handling.
frontend/src/components/QuestionSections: Renders collapsible sections for a topic's video, hints, and solution with UI buttons and state toggles.
frontend/src/components/SavedQuestionRow: Shows a saved question row with metadata and a remove button, using local saved-questions state.
frontend/src/components/TopicRow.tsx: Displays a topic row with completion and clickability states, showing different icons and styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompletedTopics.ts: Manages completed topic IDs in localStorage with toggling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, identity loading, and provider utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods exist.
frontend/src/hooks/useSavedQuestions.ts: Handles saving and removing question IDs in localStorage with toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode colors, focus states, utilities, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/lib/data.ts: Defines data structures for books, sections, and topics and exports a sample book dataset.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/BooksPage.tsx: Renders the books grid with animated book cards and navigation to each book's topics.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionDetailPage.ts: Displays a question’s details, content, and navigation between questions with actions and section components.
frontend/src/pages/SavedQuestionsPage.ts: Shows saved questions by resolving topic metadata and linking back to their respective question detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/TopicsPage.tsx: Lists a book’s sections and topics with progress indicators and navigation to individual question pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project’s design system.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, known issues, features, and UX improvement requirements for the interview prep app.
